column4: If I have a separate /home partition, how do i install gutsy so as to not overwrite the partition?
don't mount it while choosing manual partition
just define a root partition and some swap
you can use mplayer with -vo x11 i think
But XV doesnt work? x11 video looks like crap
why should it look like crap?
it looks dope. i just needed another option that let me resize the window
XV renders videos much better and uses less memory
maybe you find a way to use xv too
and does xv video work for you with compiz enabled?
it was either xv or x11 and it worked. yeah. gotta figure that out since i just reinstalled things here using gutsy.
will keep you updated as i configure it...
